class.name: AnimatedSprite3D
class.brief_description: 2D sprite node in 3D world, that can use multiple 2D textures for animation.
class.description: Animations are created using a [SpriteFrames] resource, which can be configured in the editor via the SpriteFrames panel.

method.name: play
method.description: Plays the animation named [param anim]. If no [param anim] is provided, the current animation is played. If [param backwards] is [code]true[/code], the animation will be played in reverse.

method.name: stop
method.description: Stops the current animation (does not reset the frame counter).

members.member: The current animation from the [code]frames[/code] resource. If this value changes, the [code]frame[/code] counter is reset.
If [code]true[/code], the [member animation] is currently playing.
The animation speed is multiplied by this value.

signal.name: animation_finished
signal.description: Emitted when the animation is finished (when it plays the last frame). If the animation is looping, this signal is emitted every time the last frame is drawn.
